conversation.question: How many trash_can(s) are in this room?
How many chair(s) are in this room?
How many table(s) are in this room?
How many window(s) are in this room?
How many door(s) are in this room?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (window, chair, sofa, table) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, sofa, trash_can, chair) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, window, trash_can, sofa) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, table, sofa, window) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, window, sofa, chair) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the tv and facing the closest table, is the closest chair to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the tv and facing the closest chair, is the closest sofa to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
